ai-ja288:1.2_0: he who wouldn’t have trust in this sound,
ai-ja288:1.3_0: Now I’m not here for seven months.
ai-ja288:2.1_0: “Having given up the stain of staple food,
ai-ja288:2.2_0: my religious donation has been such to me.
ai-ja288:2.3_0: remember it’s an offering to the gods.
ai-ja288:3.2_0: Nor will the gods revere him;
ai-ja288:3.3_0: A mother who partakes of her brother’s father,
ai-ja288:4.1_0: like a fishbolk in the eighth day.
